typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 转换器处理的对象或值的类型。

span.span: The type of object or value handled by the converter.

summary.span: 将对象或值转换为 JSON，或是从 JSON 转换为对象或值。

span.span: Converts an object or value to or from JSON.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何编写用于 JSON 序列化的自定义转换器](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to)。For more information, see [How to write custom converters for JSON serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to).

param.name: typeToConvert
param.span: 要针对其进行比较的类型。

summary.span: 确定是否可以转换指定类型。

span.span: Determines whether the specified type can be converted.

returns.span: 如果可以转换类型，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the type can be converted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现是 `true` 在等于时返回 `typeToConvert` `typeof(T)` 。The default implementation is to return `true` when `typeToConvert` equals `typeof(T)`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何编写用于 JSON 序列化的自定义转换器](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern)。For more information, see [How to write custom converters for JSON serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern).

summary.span: 指示是否应在序列化时将 传递到转换器，以及是否应在反序列化时传递 。

span.span: Indicates whether should be passed to the converter on serialization, and whether should be passed on deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 `true` 值类型，默认值为，对于引用类型，默认值为 `false` 转换器。The default value is `true` for converters for value types, and `false` for converters for reference types.

span.span: Reads and converts the JSON to type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何编写用于 JSON 序列化的自定义转换器](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern)。For more information, see [How to write custom converters for JSON serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern).

Public MustOverride Sub Write (writer As Utf8JsonWriter, value As T, options As JsonSerializerOptions)
public: abstract void Write(System::Text::Json::Utf8JsonWriter ^ writer, T value, System::Text::Json::JsonSerializerOptions ^ options);
abstract member Write : System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter * 'T * System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions -> unit

param.name: value
param.span: 要转换为 JSON 的值。

span.span: The value to convert to JSON.

param.name: options
param.span: 一个对象，指定要使用的序列化选项。

span.span: An object that specifies serialization options to use.

summary.span: 将指定值作为 JSON 写入。

span.span: Writes a specified value as JSON.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换器可能会引发任何异常，但它应 在无法创建 JSON 时引发。A converter may throw any exception, but it should throw when the JSON cannot be created. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何编写用于 JSON 序列化的自定义转换器](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern)。For more information, see [How to write custom converters for JSON serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern).
